name: Inherited Insignia of the Horde
htmlTooltip:
Inherited Insignia of the Horde
Binds to account
Unique
Trinket
Races: Horde
Requires level 1 to 80 (80)
Item Level 1
Equip: Increases your resilience rating by 64 (0.68% @ L80).
Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (5 minutes cooldown)
